website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, easy to digest, and a delicious range of tidbits including carrots, cantaloupe seed, and papaya; Fiesta’s cockatiel mix is sure to keep your bird buddy eager to dig out their favorites during every meal.
pros: Canary seed, white millet, safflower seed, oats, sunflower seed, and corn are the first 6 ingredients
Contains a wide mix of yummy ingredients to excite your cockatiel
cons: This otherwise tasty cockatiel mix includes 4 different artificial food colorings

customer_reviews.title: My birds adore this
customer_reviews.text: My guys are seed/food throwers. Put something in that they don't like or aren't fond of and seed flies. This doesn't. In fact they race to the bowl when I put in a new batch to nibble on. In 20 years, I've never seen Tony do that. He adores this mix and so does Trampas. I'm getting great value for my purchase and they are enjoying every nibble of it. That's the highest recommendation from those guys you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Philocrates

customer_reviews.title: My budgies’ favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My budgies love this stuff. Hands down it is their favorite among other brands I’ve tried. For now, I am mixing this with their other seed until it’s used up and then I’ll use this exclusively.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: My 22 year old cockatiel loves this food and has ...
customer_reviews.text: My 22 year old cockatiel loves this food and has been on it since she was born. She has never been sick and her feathers always look so healthy and shiny. I trust Kaytee fully!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wasted
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiels didn’t care for the ingredients in this food. They didn’t look forward to eating with this red bag. Only ate the sunflower seeds which they love but I want them to eat all of their food. The colored pellets were weird. I feed them the blue bag of cockatiel food with egg protein mixed in an these little pellets but I can’t think of their name. I give them millet as a treat every now and then. I’ll stick to what they are eating now but don’t recommend this bag. It’s colorful food but that’s about it and almost 3 times the cost of the blue bag. Can’t afford to waste.
customer_reviews.author: DukeDiesel

customer_reviews.title: Quaker prefers this blend
customer_reviews.text: Tried a bunch of different blends for my Quaker parrot. Conure, parakeet, and even regular parrot. She actually eats other things then just sunflower seeds from this one. As she obviously prefers this I would recommend it for Quaker owners. Now if I could get her to eat more of her vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It's has good deeds in it
customer_reviews.text: In not sure how I feel about this food. My birds eat the seed but throw out the rest. I sifted out the large things that look like they're from a kids cereal and saved the seed and smaller pellets. I gave the rest to my neighbor who has pet rats. They enjoyed it, so. Came fresh and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: E Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bird Food
customer_reviews.text: My two green-check conures and lutino cockatiel really like this food. The mix has a lot of good options for them to choose from. I found the large bag was a good deal over the smaller more expensive (per pound) small bags. The mix came pretty clean with very, very little garbage to be found. The birds and I are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Block

customer_reviews.title: Problem with bag splitting
customer_reviews.text: I like the ingredients used in this product. My birds don't waste much of this and I can feed it to both of them, a green cheeked conure & a lovebird. The only thing I don't care for is the packaging. Sometimes the bag will split open during processing or shipping & the product gets all over inside the box. This is very wasteful & wish for a solution to this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M.

customer_reviews.title: My cockatiel loves this food. Would have given it ...
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiel loves this food . Would have given it 5 stars but the bag had a hole in the bottom and I lost some seeds in the box and spilled some taking the bag out of the box.......
customer_reviews.author: ladycdw

customer_reviews.title: Polly Got a Balanced Food?
customer_reviews.text: Our cockatiel appreciates good, fresh seed. Kaytee Cockatiel food includes a good mix with a minimum of sunflower seed to keep him healthy. We've used this mix for years with great results. We add a daily portion of mixed vegetables for a balanced diet. Our bird is 7 years old and going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Orvil

customer_reviews.title: Pieces too large for Cockatiels/More like Cockatoo food.
customer_reviews.text: There are pieces of food that are too large for cockatiels. My bird throws the pieces into his water. I've taken out the large pieces as I feed and put them in my yard for the wild birds. No one eats them, not even the squirrels.
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahua

customer_reviews.title: Very fragrant fresh smell!
customer_reviews.text: My bags came in perfect condition and the food was very fresh. I think I enjoyed the aroma more than my 'Tiels. I only have a few suggestions to the manufacturer. 1. Make the donuts treats smaller they're too big for the average cockatiel. A sun conure would have no problem with them. 2. The white sunflower seed is too big as well. 'Tiels will sometimes drop them. Overall a great product with a bunch of different flavor to both nourish and spoil your cockatiels. I would recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amaury

customer_reviews.title: Dated product as it had bugs in it
customer_reviews.text: My beautiful cocktails are dead now because of eating this infested food, I made a huge mistake to buy bulk size 25 lbs. Kaytee Fiesta Bird Food For five Cocktails to save money . The bag was infested with bugs and I didn't realize it until my cocktails died one by one . Very sad and disappointing, please do not buy any kind food for your pet in bulk size, because you never know how long the bag of cocktail food was seating in the warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria  Kashanian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged and it’s a good healthy mix of seeds for the bird
customer_reviews.author: Cutecorgi

customer_reviews.title: My birds love this food!
customer_reviews.text: My Cockatiels and Conure really love this food! When it is sold at a great price I purchase a few bags of it for my babies. Having 12 birds this food does not go to waste since all of them like to eat their favorite pieces. Will continue to purchase this brand because it really seems to be one of their favorites. Would recommend Kaytee Fiesta to Cockatiel owners this would be a great addition to their diet.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Loves Reviews

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My Cockatiel start loosing his feathers. May had allergy to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Farah Novin

customer_reviews.title: food
customer_reviews.text: No bugs even weeks later. Birds eat it with certain parts always left in the dish but they are healthy and picky so no points off for that... The item was as advertised in the description, arrived in the correct time frame and was shipped well and all in tact upon delivery. When the price is right, Amazon is my number one go to for almost everything. The Prime membership is (a lifesaver sometimes even) well worth it and the fact you can keep things in the cart until the price drops makes it a huge shopping tool. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with crawling worms all over. Must have been old stock. Definitely will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MeSoHungry469

customer_reviews.title: Mikey likes it
customer_reviews.text: My parrotlet likes it. Just make sure you are giving fresh fruits and veggies with it if you have a parrotlet.
customer_reviews.author: Lavender H.

customer_reviews.title: Bird is actually eating
customer_reviews.text: My bird is a jerk and throws his food. I tried this brand to see if he'd like it better and sure enough he does. He still throws some of it but it is far less.
customer_reviews.author: Washington Gamer House

customer_reviews.title: Bag was open
customer_reviews.text: The bag was open , it has a funny odor,,, it has a clean cut like with a knife, the food was all over the box,,,, I won't feed this to my cockatiels for sure
customer_reviews.author: Ken Krauss

customer_reviews.title: Bird was mad at me
customer_reviews.text: My bird did not like this food. He really likes seeds and this had little to no seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Scared birds finally tried it :)they love it
customer_reviews.text: My birds where scared to try this food at first since they where only given one type of seed by previous owner smh I’m happy to say that they are trying all the different colors of food and loving it :) highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: jasmin zamora

customer_reviews.title: Kaytee fiesta bird food
customer_reviews.text: My green cheeks likes this. They don’t waste very much of it.
customer_reviews.author: BEV QUINN

customer_reviews.title: MY COCKATIELS LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I had to find another bird food because the online place is no more and neither is their food which my birds have always eaten. So I decided to give this a try and my four cockatiels LOVE this Kaytee Fiesta! I know Kaytee will always be there to give my birds. They eat Kaytee pellets too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have always loved this product and so do all our parrots.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Deskins

customer_reviews.title: Not all natural
customer_reviews.text: Why does there have to be fake food coloring in bird food? My bird doesn't need red dye 40 in his diet...just sayin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our tiel doesn't like it - too many larger pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Our bird doesn't like this at all - there are WAY too many large pieces that she can't even eat. This mix seems to be geared toward much larger birds. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie S.

customer_reviews.title: Not to Louis's taste - low quality mix
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiel does not eat most of the stuff in this odd mix. Definitely not large kibble items. Waste of money and low quality. My avian vet advised us to stick with high quality Lafeber items and fresh fruit and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Tx Laura

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product but my bird prefers something with an orange or a cinnamon essence. He is 13 and set in his ways. Some birds like the vitamin rich shapes they put in there. My bird likes some of them but not the large rings. I will buy a different Kaytee product next time but for now, he is eating up the Fiesta without my having to throw away very much of it. Bag was slightly damaged but not enough fell out to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Our Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: We have a 6 month old cockatiel who absolutely loves this food. Every evening when I clean his house and give Mika a new dish of food, he jumps on it eagerly and fills up. The combination appears to be a perfect ticket to happiness.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: NOT IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: My cockateil doesn't like it...I will go back to buying Celestial... Just by looking at it I was unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: JESSE

customer_reviews.title: Lasts over a month for two birds!
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiels love this seed mix! Contains nutrients so my birds are always active and their colors & feathers are healthy looking. 1 bag lasts them over a month!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Very good blend for medium-sized birds
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good mix for medium-sized birds and is the favorite main diet of our lovebird. Some mixes contain less-balanced varieties of seeds and nutritional components, which leads to waste. This product is an excellent blend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: ... seller sent my Cockatiel food promptly and it was good & fresh
customer_reviews.text: The seller sent my Cockatiel food promptly and it was good & fresh. My cockatiel loves this food. I have tried others in the pursuit of saving a buck, but it's never worth it. Some of the brands have given my bird diarrhea, but the Kaytee brand never has failed my Corky. So from now on I stick to Kaytee. This has a nice variety of seeds, and fruit & veggie pellets, so I feel like my bird is getting the variety she wants and needs.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good service. Almost half price and fresher than the pet store. Bird happy me happy
customer_reviews.author: david s layaou

customer_reviews.title: Great small bird seed
customer_reviews.text: This is my main food for my smaller breeding birds. I like that you can get it in bulk, and it is a good mid-grade food. Always fresh and low dust.
customer_reviews.author: Monte Sue

customer_reviews.title: Something to whistle about
customer_reviews.text: My old cockatiel is picky but loves this food. Too many foods have stuff that she will not touch but she seems satisfied with this. It is consistent, economical, and makes my Birdy happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cookiek8

customer_reviews.title: More in the bag
customer_reviews.text: My bird said there should be more in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Larry Collins

customer_reviews.title: My bird loves this food
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has it for a great price. Although it got lost in the mail, they shipped another really fast.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Eh....
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's good. Lot's of stuff that the tiels will not touch. Throw out more than I use.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely my birds' favorite special mix
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely my birds' favorite special mix. I mix this with their regular pellets as a special treat and they love it. They are a love bird and maxi pionus for reference!
customer_reviews.author: Mindi Sue

customer_reviews.title: Bird loves it
customer_reviews.text: My African Grey loves this food and won't eat anything else. I have tried but she just ends up throwing the others out of her dish so I stick with Kaytee!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much my cockateil will eat
customer_reviews.text: My bird won't eat 2/3 of the seeds and other stuff that's in this mix.
customer_reviews.author: Hard T. PleaseTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: To many unhealthy seeds
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as being healthy for the tiels, but has to many high fat seeds, such as sunflower seeds. The tiels tend to avoid the rest of the food and eat the sunflower seeds. These seeds are high in fat and not good for house bound tiels. Wild birds use a lot more energy and the high fat content won't hurt them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex V.

customer_reviews.title: Good seed fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, but not packed the best. Bird food is fresh and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My two cockatiels love this seed mix and the price is good compared to pet stores!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Bean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value, my bird loves it!! Nice mix and grain vegs and seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Klingenberg

customer_reviews.title: Picky bird
customer_reviews.text: My bird is very picky but he really likes this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chop away!
customer_reviews.text: My Cockatiels drop much of the bigger pieces to the bottom of the cage. But they seem to enjoy the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cockatiel and a conure and they absolutely love this food. Would recommend to any small bird owner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful food!!
customer_reviews.text: My 23 year old Nanday Conure has been eating nothing but Kaytee products. In my opinion, there is no better bird food!
customer_reviews.author: NevadaNative

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: our little cockatiel loves this stuff. the only bird food we feed him now, except treats.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sieveking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My bird's favorite food - totally nutritionally complete, very diverse, and my cockatiel LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Astrophied

customer_reviews.title: Fiesta Seeds too fancy for finicky cockateil
customer_reviews.text: My cockateil is very particular about what he eats. Does not seem to like the pre-formed "nuggets" and chunks of fruits, throwing them out of his food dish. He also does not like to eat the safflower seeds. My cockateil is very finicky about what he eats.
customer_reviews.author: Spongo

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: product was exactly as advertised. We order from them a lot and have never experienced any issues. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: chris henry

customer_reviews.title: Good food for cockateils
customer_reviews.text: My bird likes it but there is lots of waste. That might be my picky bird....
customer_reviews.author: scales in balance

customer_reviews.title: He seems very happy with the variety of the mix
customer_reviews.text: My bird loves it! He seems very happy with the variety of the mix. We have tried other foods and this seems to be his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: M. B

customer_reviews.title: Even for picky birds!
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiels love it! I was worried that my sever year old tiel wouldn't enjoy this, as he's really picky, but he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Ripped bags!
customer_reviews.text: Always a great price, but must be seconds because bags always have a small tear in them. The tears means bird food doesn’t stay fresh like it would in an airtight container. This 4th time bags were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ilonanj

customer_reviews.title: cockatiel seed
customer_reviews.text: Birds eat lots of different foods including seed. I often buy this one b/c it has a lot of variety in one bag and isn't too expensive. The birds don't seem to like the pellets in it but eat everything else.
customer_reviews.author: cornspot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find in stores. My cocktail loves the food
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Out dated food
customer_reviews.text: The bird food is out dated and stale my birds won't eat it smells stale
customer_reviews.author: Jill didonato

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Our bird loves this food. I have tried others that he ignores. This is all I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Steinhart

customer_reviews.title: my love bird loves this seed
customer_reviews.text: Almost time to reorder, my love bird loves this seed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but it contains a lot of pellets that ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good, but it contains a lot of pellets that are quite big, so my bird ignores them. He likes the seeds though.
customer_reviews.author: ARM

customer_reviews.title: My birds love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and it was shipped rather quickly to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 7 birds that are small parrots ( 2 different kinds of parrots) do not like this in the larger bag but love the smaller one wh
customer_reviews.text: The big bag is of a lesser quality than the smaller bag - I had to mix it with other seed my birds love before they would eat it - Thanks Amazon for the choices you give us Bird Parents.
customer_reviews.author: little joey

customer_reviews.title: Kaytee Fiesta
customer_reviews.text: My Cockatiel is 15 years old and he loves this food.
customer_reviews.author: yuliya tsvetkova

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and price is right. My cockatiel loves it. I also buy the millet seed heads. On line shopping means no traffic.
customer_reviews.author: winnie reed

customer_reviews.title: The bird loves it
customer_reviews.text: My quaker parrot decided that this bird food was the one that he mostly ate and enjoyed. Try it for your bird.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Hay

customer_reviews.title: Kaytee Cockatiel Food
customer_reviews.text: This is a great food for my cockatiels. I've bought it before and I'll buy it again
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: She likes it!!
customer_reviews.text: My sweet cockatiel seems to really like this seed mixture which I've been using for years. Amazon has a very competitive price and it comes right to the door which is a great convenience. I always add scrambled eggs with breadcrumbs and honey on top of her seeds (warm of course because that's how she prefers it- lol) but then she enjoys the seeds!!
customer_reviews.author: Sushiyaya

customer_reviews.title: birds are picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: My 2 are pickey eaters but they do eat this food. Price is good and so far they look well nourished. Guess it's o.k.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Use as a secondary food for variety
customer_reviews.text: We mic this food in with our main mix for a little variety. The birds seem to like it and I feel better giving them variety.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D Colton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Healthy & my birds love this stuff!! Fast delivery too!!
customer_reviews.author: Buzzerbomb

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived fast and in great condition. Will purchase again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: IGGYROCK

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Cockatile Food
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this bird seed at my local grocery store. They stopped carrying it. My cockatiel will only eat this seed. So, I searched and searched and thank goodness I found what my "little baby" likes. It was shipped promptly and was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenza Janet Morgenroth

customer_reviews.title: Our cockatiel love this food
customer_reviews.text: This is our regular item for our cockatiel. Our cockatiel love this food.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kasai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much more cost effective then purchasing at a pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Buy once a month from Amazon for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Buying from Amazon once a month is much cheaper then buying from Petsmart. I use the Amazon subscribe and save for an additional 5% off. Don't like that amazon now charges tax. Its good food that is full of vitamins for your bird and keeps him healthy.
customer_reviews.author: IntoTech

customer_reviews.title: Kaytee Fiesta for cockatiels makes good treats
customer_reviews.text: We feed a pelleted food to all our birds but, from time to time, they need a treat and this product works very well,.
customer_reviews.author: Torun

customer_reviews.title: Best Bird Seed Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding this seed to my Sun Conure and my Cockatiel for over 10 years. They love it and they are always healthy. I've tried other brands but always come back to the Fiesta.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Bird Food
customer_reviews.text: This bird seed was received very fast and love that I don't have to run out for small packages. My parrot has a big appetite and love being able to purchase a larger bag and have it delivers so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Pat J

customer_reviews.title: Great price and our birds love it!
customer_reviews.text: Its the same birdseed I buy at the pet store only 60% off! Whats not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Tom Clark

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: I've been using kaytee bird food for a while now and the birds never complained from it so yeah a thumbs up for kaytee.
customer_reviews.author: R. Al-azmi

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: brings a kind of foil very very hard! .. cost me my chewing ... but otherwise my cockatiles are like crazy! like! but these hard pieces and leave the grip on the floor
customer_reviews.author: Kaycampos08

customer_reviews.title: Average Cockatiel food
customer_reviews.text: This bird food is good but to many big pieces for my cockatiel. So I have to say more waste then eaten.
customer_reviews.author: sandy J Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The only food for my cockatiel.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 24yrs cockatiel, Phoenix. This is the only food I’ve ever fed her. I think 24yrs is a good measure of how good this food is for your family birdie.....
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good quaker food
customer_reviews.text: Its a good produt I have bought it for years
customer_reviews.author: Marta Galvez

customer_reviews.title: Birds like it.
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiels likes this food. It has a lot of variety in it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn from Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Loved the freshness & both cockatiel and budgies love it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie craig

product_meta.title: Kaytee Fiesta Bird Food For Cockatiels
product_meta.description: Size:4-1/2 lb| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingKaytee Fiesta Cockatiel food is a nutritionally fortified gourmet diet made of a premium blend of fruits, vegetables, seeds and grains offering maximum variety, fun and nutrition for pet birds. Fiesta contains prebiotics and probiotics to support digestive health and is formulated with your bird species in mind. Kaytee understands that sharing your life with a pet bird is not only enjoyable but very enriching. Kaytee shows our love by ensuring we provide your pet bird with the best nutrition for a long and healthy life. With over 150 years of nutritional experience, it's no wonder why Kaytee is at the heart of every healthy feeding routine.
feature_bullets: Nutritionally Fortified Gourmet Food For Cockatiels
Omega 3'S To Support Brain And Heart Health
Antioxidants For General Health And Immune Support
Enhances Skin And Feather Health For Vibrant, Healthy Plumage
Contains Fruits, Nuts, Veggies And Textures For Nutritional Variety
Prebiotics And Probiotics To Support Digestive Health

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
